directions: Mix together diced tomatoes and green chiles, cucumbers, roma tomatoes, cilantro, onion, jalapeno pepper and kosher salt in a bowl. Serve immediately; for best flavor, chill for at least one hour.
ingredients: 3 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes and green chilies, drained
2 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped (or more to taste)
1/4 cup chopped onion, or to taste
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, or to taste
title: Fresh and Light Cucumber Salsa
